comments.text: The score drops if we open more tabs. Maybe this is not JS related because we perform per-compartment GCs but it's worth investigating.
comments.raw_text: The score drops if we open more tabs. Maybe this is not JS related because we perform per-compartment GCs but it's worth investigating.
comments.creator: anygregor@gmail.com
comments.author: anygregor@gmail.com

comments.text:
(In reply to Gregor Wagner [:gwagner] from comment #0)
> The score drops if we open more tabs. Maybe this is not JS related because
> we perform per-compartment GCs but it's worth investigating.

When I run the test I see about 1/3-1/2 of GCs compartment, the rest global.
